content: A very proud grandfather announces his second granddaughter is, as of today, a brand new A1C in the USAF headed to Lackland AFB, TX. She is taking the same trip that her grandmother took 49 years ago – Kansas City to Lackland AFB. Yesterday her sister started USCG reserve training an YN3 at Camp May, NJ. Their proud father served as a USCG BM3. Their proud mother is an active duty USCG YNCM. The USCG has the USAF surrounded in this May 2008 photograph: And me, I'm just a proud old soldier. God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans

content: Congrated!! What AFSC?? I got two sons in the Air Force - mechanics on KC-135s. They both went to Lackland. Wandering and Wondering
reply: Congrated!! What AFSC?? I got two sons in the Air Force - mechanics on KC-135s. They both went to Lackland. Wandering and Wondering
title: A very proud old soldier

content: It will be one of four schools. I don't know what they are at the moment. She was not scheduled to go in for a month or so. Her uncle, her dad's brother, just retired as a AF CMS in nuclear security or something like. She had originally signed up for the SERE program, but the AF dropped it as an enlistment option. Her BA is in social work and counseling. She doesn't want to sit behind a desk. I'll post it as soon as we know. Her grandmother was an admin clerk and her mom and sister are yeomen. So, far the only sad part of this is that she wanted to enlist in Florida with me administering the oath. My daughter just told me the girls named each other as there primary beneficiary. Oh yes, 100 years ago, I did four years in the AF as a 685.50A. God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans
